branchCategory.name: VP300/500/700, 3 Port Solenoid Valve, Base Mounted, Single Unit
branchCategory.description: SMC's VP300/500/700 series solenoid valve, offers high flow capacity and reduced power consumption (1.55W standard, 0.55W with power saving circuit).  The series may be used as either a selector valve, or a divider valve.  It is vacuum applicable up to â€“101.2kPa.  Series VP3145/3165/3185 is a large size, 3 port solenoid valve with a rubber seal.  It is possible to use the series in vacuum applications or under low pressure.  Both series are available in a normally closed or normally open styles.

breadCrumb.name: VP300/500/700, 3 Port Solenoid Valve, Base Mounted, Single Unit
